module.name: billpay
module.description: Billpay is the payment for the successful e-commerce expert. With Billpay online merchants are able to offer their customers payment by invoice without any risk.<br><span style="color: #CB1C00;"><sup>*</sup>&nbsp;Do not delete this module!</span>
